pricingNote: Final prices varies by hair length/thickness, technique, and consultation. Prices shown are from and may differ by location.

services.name: Wash • Blow Dry
services.outcome: A fresh, polished finish with bounce and shine.
prepNotes: Arrive with detangled hair if possible.
afterCare: Avoid tight styles for 24 hours to keep the finish smooth.

services.name: Ladies Cut
services.outcome: A precise cut that grows out beautifully.
prepNotes: Bring reference photos if you have a specific shape in mind.
afterCare: Rebook every 6–10 weeks for shape maintenance.

services.name: Wash • Cut • Blow Dry
services.outcome: A complete refresh: clean, shaped, and finished.
prepNotes: If you wear your hair curly, tell your stylist before the cut.
afterCare: Avoid heavy oils on day 1 to keep the finish airy.

services.name: Silk Press • Sleek Finish
prepNotes: Avoid heavy styling products before your appointment.
afterCare: Wrap hair at night; avoid steam or moisture for 48 hours.

services.name: Root Tint
prepNotes: Tell us your colour history (box dye, henna, prior bleach).
afterCare: Use colour-safe shampoo; avoid hot water for 48 hours.

services.name: Half Head Foils
services.outcome: Soft dimension and brightness where it counts.
prepNotes: Bring reference photos of your desired tone.
afterCare: Purple shampoo 1–2x weekly if going blonde.

services.name: Full Head Foils
services.outcome: All-over brightness with refined, even placement.
prepNotes: Expect longer timing for thick or very long hair.
afterCare: Use bond repair weekly; avoid heat for 48 hours.

services.name: Balayage
services.outcome: Lived-in colour with effortless, premium dimension.
prepNotes: Share your natural hair colour + prior lightening history.
afterCare: Use sulphate-free shampoo; refresh tone every 6–10 weeks.

services.name: Balayage + Root Colour
services.outcome: Depth at the root with luminous balayage brightness.
prepNotes: Best for clients wanting dimension without harsh regrowth lines.
afterCare: Bond treatment recommended weekly for 4 weeks.

services.name: Deep Conditioning Repair
prepNotes: Tell us if you have had chemical treatments recently.

services.name: Scalp Care + Massage
services.outcome: A calm reset for scalp comfort and hair health.
prepNotes: Let us know if you are fragrance sensitive.
afterCare: Avoid heavy oils for 48 hours if scalp is congested.

services.name: Smoothing Treatment (Brazilian-style)
services.outcome: Reduced frizz and easier styling with a sleek finish.
prepNotes: Timing varies by length and density.
afterCare: Follow your stylist’s wash/wait guidance for best longevity.

services.name: Protective Styling Consult + Prep
services.outcome: Healthy prep that makes protective styles look better and last longer.
prepNotes: Bring your extension hair if needed; we can advise on type/weight.
afterCare: Hydrate scalp lightly; avoid heavy buildup.

services.name: Braids (Starter From)
services.outcome: Neat, long-wearing braids with a clean finish.
prepNotes: Duration varies by braid size and length.
afterCare: Use a braid spray; protect at night with a satin wrap.

services.name: Wig / Weave Installation
services.outcome: Secure, natural-looking install with a polished finish.
prepNotes: Bring your unit clean and ready if possible.
afterCare: Follow maintenance schedule to protect edges and scalp.

services.name: Full House Weave (Removal + Wash + Cornrows + Install + Style)
services.outcome: A complete refresh with clean prep and a flawless final style.
prepNotes: Timing varies by condition of existing install and hair density.
afterCare: Schedule a maintenance visit every 2–4 weeks.
